summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of Reaction Time Game. All 9 required features tested and working correctly including state transitions, early click detection, results display, comparison chart, and keyboard support.

design_issues.issue: Empty string src attribute causing console warning for comparison chart images

passed_tests: Start button transitions to red waiting screen
Red screen displays 'Wait for green...' message
Green screen appears after random delay (1-4 seconds)
Clicking green screen shows accurate reaction time
Results modal with time, quip, and percentile badge
Comparison chart with 10 entities plus user result
Try Again button resets game to idle state
Early click shows 'Too Soon!' warning and auto-resets
Keyboard spacebar support for all game actions
Smooth state transitions and visual feedback
